name: Leaving Planet Earth
description:
Story

You play as an 'Alien'. Your secret base has been found by human. You must leave the Earth. You have couple of spaceship but 1 pilot. Autopilot cannot avoid obstacles (at least in this game..). You have to go back and forth between the spaceship in order to manually control it, avoid the obstacles and save your allies. Oh! Do you think the human will let you go... Well. Forget it!

How To Play

Touch on any of your spaceship to select it. Your pilot will move towards the spaceship.

Once the pilot are inside, touch and drag the spaceship to move it.

Remember, you only have 1 pilot. Spaceship without a pilot cannot be move.

Avoid the obstacles.

Don't crash into your other spaceship.

And watch out for human missile!

Booster

Booster will boost your pilot speed. If you connect to the internet and wait a few second in Main Menu, booster will be available. However to be able to use it, you are require to watch ads. 

Good luck fellow alien! By the way, if your score are too low.. you might want to change "formation".

NOTES: CONTAIN ADS

If you have any feedback, leave your comment below or contact me directly @ mrwitcher3000@gmail.com.
